properties.headline: Flood Warning issued March 1 at 9:06PM MST until March 3 at 1:00PM MST by NWS Glasgow MT
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Glasgow has issued a flood warning
for the following rivers in Montana...

Beaver Creek near Hinsdale affecting Valley County

.Levels on the Beaver Creek have been rising due primarily to snowmelt. Minor fluctuations can be expected with ice with a crest expected by Monday close to Flood Stage. Levels are expected to drop by mid-week.

The National Weather Service in Glasgow has issued a

* Flood Warning for
The Beaver Creek near Hinsdale.
* at  8:30 PM Sunday the stage was 13.7 feet.
* Flood stage is 14.0 feet.
properties.instruction:
SAFETY MESSAGE...

Residents along the Beaver Creek near Hinsdale need to remain alert for rising water levels in the river. Low lying area continue to be under water.

Stay tuned to developments by listening to NOAA Weather radio.

The latest statements and forecasts for rivers and streams can be
found at our web page...
